titles.title: It Doesn't Matter What They Say

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
It doesn't matter what they say:
You've been called another way.
To be separate and untarnished by the world.
It doesn't matter what they do,
If His calling is on you.
Come ye out and be ye separate, saith the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We were fishing by the Sea of Galilee,
Casting down our nets into the sea.
When along came the Master
Saying, Come and follow after me,
And I will make you fishers of men.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We were dwelling in a dry and thirsty land,
When the Lord said He'd destroy it by His hand.
Then the Lord said, Noah, hearken,
Go build yourself an ark and
Take your family and each beast two of a kind.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
In the land of Ur God spoke to Abraham,
Arise, depart into another land.
Then Abraham not knowing
Just where he might be going
Put his trust in God to lead him in the way.
